name: Mounika Uppalapati
title: Full Stack Developer
tagline: Building scalable web and enterprise applications with modern technologies
summary: Full Stack Developer with 3+ years of experience building scalable web and enterprise applications. Experienced with Java, Python, React, Angular, Spring Boot, and AWS. I design and implement RESTful APIs and modern front-end applications, and collaborate with teams using Agile practices to deliver production-ready, maintainable software.

experience.description: Working as a Software Developer building scalable web and data-processing applications using Java, Python, and modern web stacks; collaborating in Agile teams to deliver production features.
Contributed to frontend and backend development of responsive web applications, focusing on API design and integration with SQL/NoSQL databases.

Developed responsive web pages using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Bootstrap. Collaborated with developers to integrate frontend components with backend APIs, and gained experience in Git version control and Agile workflows.

education.institution: Missouri University of Science and Technology
education.degree: Master of Science (MS) in Computer and Information Sciences

education.institution: Prasad V. Potluri Siddhartha Institute of Technology

certifications: Oracle Cloud Infrastructure 2025 AI Foundations Associate

projects.title: AI-Powered Job Application Tracker
projects.description: Developed a full-stack platform with AI-driven resume tailoring, ATS scoring, interview preparation, and job tracking features to streamline the job search workflow.

projects.title: Self-Supervised Classification Network
projects.description: Implemented SimCLR for self-supervised learning on ImageNet, improving representation quality for downstream classification tasks.

projects.title: Driver Drowsiness Detection
projects.description: Real-time drowsiness detection using computer vision (OpenCV) and deep learning to enhance road safety.

projects.title: Forest Fire Prediction
projects.description: Predictive ML model to forecast forest fires based on environmental data with clear visualizations of feature importance.

projects.title: Green Basket E-Commerce Website
projects.description: Responsive e-commerce web app with dynamic product listings and cart management, focused on UI/UX and performance.

projects.title: Self-Budgeting App
projects.description: Cross-platform expense tracker with cash/credit/debit categories, CRUD, and monthly summaries. Built with React Native (Expo) and AsyncStorage.
